item.title: 德意志交易所清流公司将提供比特币和以太币托管服务
item.description: 德意志交易所（Deutsche Boerse）的交易后部门 Clearstream 表示，它将在今年晚些时候向机构客户提供加密货币结算和托管服务，这标志着欧洲主要金融机构对数字资产类别的最新推动。【原文：Deutsche Boerse’s post-trade unit Clearstream said it will offer cryptocurrency settlement and custody services to institutional clients later this year, marking the latest push into the digital asset class by a major European financial institution.】

item.title: 中国全卡车联盟准备走出国门的第一步
item.description: 在几年前被国内监管机构剪掉翅膀后，Full Truck Alliance Co. 公司正准备进军中亚，加入越来越多寻求海外新市场的中国科技公司的行列。【原文：Full Truck Alliance Co. is preparing to expand into Central Asia after getting its wings clipped by domestic regulators a few years ago, joining a growing number of Chinese tech companies seeking new markets abroad.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将在全球大跌后小幅反弹
对美国经济蔓延的担忧促使交易商在全球范围内寻找避险工具
item.description: 从抛弃美股转投中国股市，到买入日元和欧元，交易员们都在四处躲避，因为他们在思考美国市场的崩溃可能会给世界带来怎样的冲击。【原文：From ditching US stocks for Chinese peers to buying the yen and the euro, traders are running for cover as they ponder how a US markets meltdown may convulse the world.】

item.title: 中国股市将创下七年来最佳人大表现
item.description: 即使近期出现下滑，中国股市仍有望创下 2018 年以来全国两会期间的最佳表现。【原文：Even with the recent slide, Chinese shares are poised to post their best performance during a National People’s Congress since 2018.】

item.title: 韩国新外汇规则再次呼吁进行更多根本性改革
item.description: 分析人士说，韩国促进外汇流入的新措施只是在边际上做了一些调整，这将带来短期的稳定，同时也暴露出需要从根本上改变政策。【原文：South Korea’s new measures to boost foreign currency inflows are tinker-at-the-margins tweaks that will breed short-term stability while exposing the need for more fundamental policy changes, analysts say.】

item.title: 据说印度央行将要求贷款人报告更多离岸掉期交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度央行要求贷款机构扩大报告离岸利率衍生品交易的范围，以更好地管理海外资金流动。【原文：India’s central bank asked lenders to widen the scope of reporting offshore interest rate derivative trades as it seeks to better manage overseas flows, according to people familiar with the developments.】

item.title: 中国股票大甩卖吸引长期投资者回归
item.description: 多年来，全球长期投资者一直对中国的交易避而远之，如今却在中国下了价值数十亿美元的订单。【原文：Global long-term investors are placing billions of dollars worth of orders in Chinese deals after years of largely shunning them.】

item.title: 主要天然气出口国澳大利亚进口液化天然气似乎不可避免
item.description: 澳大利亚化石燃料蕴藏量和人口分布的不均衡，再加上基础设施不足，意味着世界上最大的液化天然气出口国之一不久将不得不进口这种燃料。【原文：The lopsidedness of Australia’s fossil fuel endowment and demographic spread, coupled with insufficient infrastructure, means one of the world’s biggest exporters of liquefied natural gas will soon have to import the fuel.】

item.title: 南非业务带动 Absa 盈利超预期
item.description: 随着南非从多年的经济衰退中复苏，Absa 集团有限公司公布的利润超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Absa Group Ltd. reported profit that exceeded analysts’ forecasts as South Africa, the lender’s home market, recovers from years of economic decay.】

item.title: 韩国投资者买入香港股票数量为三年来最多
item.description: 由于投资者追逐股市上涨带来的收益，韩国人在 2 月份购买了三年来最多的香港股票。【原文：South Koreans bought the most Hong Kong equities in three years in February as investors chased gains from a stock market rally.】

item.title: 您的活动部件清单— 日本、大跌、卡尼
item.description:
美国股市再次受到日本的打击，而加拿大的新领导人需要在白宫交朋友。【原文：

US stocks take another beating from Japan, while Canada’s new leader needs friends in the White House.

】

item.title: 投资者从瑞典风电场的困境中吸取惨痛教训
item.description: Markbygden Ett 位于瑞典北极圈以南的一片凛冽高原上，去年年底投产后成为欧洲最大的陆上风电开发项目中的皇冠上的明珠。尽管长期合同被认为是安全的，但它却成为了一次代价高昂的教训，让人们认识到根据能源价格的可预测性或天气本身进行交易的危险性。【原文：Located on a blustery plateau just south of the Arctic Circle in Sweden, Markbygden Ett became the crown jewel of Europe’s largest onshore wind development when it went online late last decade. Despite a long-term contract assumed to be safe, it became an expensive lesson in the dangers of making deals based on the predictability of energy prices — or the weather itself.】

item.title: 房主本不是封建农奴
item.description:
英国工党政府承诺逐步废除不公平的房屋所有权制度，而这一制度的时代早已过去。【原文：

The UK’s Labour government promises to phase out an unfair system of home ownership whose time has long passed.

】

item.title: 窃贼正在袭击尼日利亚的天然气管道。但不是为了偷天然气
item.description: 盗贼团伙窃取非洲最大液化天然气工厂的输气管道，收集凝析油，这种碳氢化合物在当地比原油更受欢迎，这种危险的行为导致尼日利亚的液化天然气出口量急剧下降。【原文：Gangs of thieves are tapping the pipelines that feed Africa’s biggest liquefied natural gas plant, collecting condensate — a hydrocarbon more desirable locally than crude — in a dangerous pursuit that’s sent Nigeria’s LNG exports plummeting.】

item.title: CCC 股价上涨三倍后，亿万富翁寻求股票出售许可
item.description: 达柳什-米莱克（Dariusz Milek）的鞋类和时装业务去年价值飙升了三倍，重新成为亿万富翁。现在，他的大胆设想和豪气面临着公司其他股东的审查。【原文：Dariusz Milek regained billionaire status when his footwear and fashion business surged threefold in value last year. Now his bold vision and swagger face scrutiny from the company’s other shareholders.】

item.title: 意大利的债券焦虑影响了梅洛尼从国防到银行的战略
item.description: 对于意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）来说，导致西尔维奥-贝卢斯科尼（Silvio Berlusconi）下台的债务危机仍然是一个令人不安的记忆，它不断推动着她的决策。【原文：For Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni, the debt crisis that caused Silvio Berlusconi’s downfall remains such an unnerving memory that it keeps driving her decision-making.】

item.title: 坦克制造商股票在欧洲新订单中的热度超过了 LVMH 集团
item.description: 欧洲各国政府急于增加军费开支，引发了国防类股票的强劲反弹，其估值之高不亚于该地区高高在上的奢侈品。【原文：A rush by European governments to boost military spending has unleashed a rally in defense stocks so strong that they’re now as richly valued as the region’s high-flying luxury names.】

item.title: 新政府关注支出，加纳面临紧缩预算
item.description: 加纳财政部长卡西尔-阿托-福尔松（Cassiel Ato Forson）周二的预算案预计将削减开支，因为新政府在经历了痛苦的债务重组后正在寻求经济稳定。【原文：Ghana Finance Minister Cassiel Ato Forson’s budget on Tuesday is expected to deliver spending cuts as the new government seeks economic stability after a painful debt restructuring.】

item.title: Tennet 启动股权出售，德国电网估值达 270 亿欧元
item.description: 荷兰国有电网运营商 Tennet Holding BV 正式开始为其庞大的德国高压电网寻找投资者，标志着期待已久的私有化进程迈出了新的一步。【原文：Dutch state-owned grid operator Tennet Holding BV is officially launching the search for investors in its massive German high-voltage grid, marking the next step in a long-awaited privatization process.】

item.title: 日本财务大臣称收益率上升并非全是坏事
item.description: 日本财政大臣周二表示，日本债券收益率的上升将对经济产生积极和消极两方面的影响，他的这一评论可能旨在缓解近期市场对借贷成本上升的担忧。【原文：Japan’s rising bond yields will have both positive and negative effects on the economy, the nation’s finance minister said Tuesday in a comment likely aimed at easing recent market concern over higher borrowing costs.】

item.title: 策略师称泰铢在黄金推动下的反弹面临风险
item.description: 泰国货币今年受到了金价上涨的提振。但策略师警告说，随着关税风险和降息政策开始发威，这不足以保护泰国货币。【原文：Thailand’s currency has received a boost this year from a rally in gold prices. But strategists warn that won’t be enough to protect it as tariff risks and interest-rate cuts start to bite.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长称将进一步降息
item.description: 菲律宾中央银行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，在没有任何经济意外的情况下，"再降息几次 "是可以考虑的。【原文：Philippine Central Bank Governor Eli Remolona said “a few more rate cuts” are on the table in the absence of any economic surprises.】

item.title: 受衍生品交易影响，印度印度指数（IndusInd）跌幅为五年来最大
item.description: 印度印度银行（IndusInd Bank Ltd.）的股价创下了五年来的最大跌幅，此前这家印度贷款公司称发现其衍生品投资组合存在差异，并警告称盈利将受到一次性打击。【原文：Shares of IndusInd Bank Ltd. tumbled by the most in five years after the Indian lender said it found discrepancies in its derivatives portfolio and warned of a one-time hit to earnings.】

item.title: 增长忧虑导致全球股市跌势延续，亚洲股市暴跌
item.description: 由于对美国经济增长的担忧与日俱增，投资者纷纷逃离风险资产，加上日本令人失望的数据也对市场情绪造成了影响，亚洲股市暴跌，连续第三天下跌。【原文：Asian stocks slumped, headed for a third day of losses, as investors fled risk assets amid growing concern over US economic growth, with disappointing data from Japan also weighing on sentiment.】

item.title: 中美关税谈判停留在较低水平，激起挫败感
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，中美之间就贸易和其他问题的谈判停留在较低层次，双方各说各话，未能就最佳进展方式达成一致。【原文：Talks between the US and China on trade and other issues are stuck at lower levels, people familiar with the matter said, with both sides talking past each other and failing to agree on the best way to proceed.】

item.title: 乌克兰在美国会谈前向莫斯科发动创纪录的无人机袭击
item.description: 俄罗斯防空部队击落了 60 架以莫斯科为目标的乌克兰无人机，这似乎是长达三年的战争中对俄罗斯首都发动的最大规模攻击。【原文：Russian air defense downed 60 Ukrainian drones targeting Moscow in what seems to be the largest attack at the Russian capital of the three-year-long war.】

item.title: 中国扩大两年期债券销售，在债务大跌中创纪录
item.description: 中国政府计划发行创纪录的两年期债券，而此时债市抛售正在加剧，中国债券本周将面临严峻考验。【原文：Chinese bonds face a crucial test this week as the government plans a record issuance of two-year notes just when a debt-market selloff is worsening.】

item.title: 据说 Innovent 将考虑就抗癌药物建立许可合作关系
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，在香港上市的创新生物公司（Innovent Biologics Inc.【原文：Hong Kong-listed Innovent Biologics Inc. is considering a licensing partnership to develop a cancer drug that’s showing promise in treating several types of tumor, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 预计中国经济转好，印度金属股 2025 年或将表现优异
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】
